title: Galaxy A52s 5G owners are facing lots of issues after installing the One UI 4.0 update
content:
In January, Samsung rolled out a stable One UI 4.0 update to the Galaxy A52s 5G. But it looks like the new software is far from stable and is littered with many bugs and issues. According to multiple reports on Samsung Community forums, Galaxy A52s 5G owners are facing various issues and performance degradation after

The post Galaxy A52s 5G owners are facing lots of issues after installing the One UI 4.0 update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to reports on Samsung Community forums, Galaxy A52s 5G owners are facing various issues after installing the One UI 4.0 update.
